Dear Arjun,

 

I hope you are well.  Please find the latest update attached from SIS ID regarding a new insurance proposition.

 

Are we still on track to complete all the remaining actions this week (legal review, final negotiations and insurance confirmation from Hagop?)  Please let me know if you need me to follow up on anything, because we have the public holiday approaching and need to make progress before then.

 

Thank you

 

JAMES ADAMS​​​​

Dear all,

 

I hope you're doing well.

 

We wanted to share with you some recent information concerning Sis ID's value proposition: after 7 years of collaboration with insurer SMA, Sis ID has now entered into a new partnership with Allianz Trade (formerly Euler Hermes), a leading international player. This strategic alliance enables us to enhance our offering by including a tailor made insurance coverage, directly integrated with the Sis ID subscription, to be reimbursed in the event of fraudulent payment (see attachment for more details).

 

At your disposal for further info, have a good day.

 

Regards.

Hi all,

 

I hope this e-mail finds you well.

 

As agreed, our proposal is attached. You'll notice we've optimized discount levels on both our license costs and setup fees.

 

We've also added on p.3 a recap of our key differentiators with the competition. As an example, the fact that a large number of your peers on the beauty and fashion industries being Sis ID clients: LVMH Group, Hermès Group, Chanel, Richemont Group, L’Oréal, Sisley...

 

I remain available for further info if needed.

 

Have a pleasant day.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			International Sales Manager

	
+33 6 52 22 87 26

Objet : RE: Chalhoub/BNPP/Sis ID -- bank details control

 

Hi all,

 

You're right Waqas, it means the number of vendors that will be controlled through Sis ID annually. Considering these volumes, I worked on 2 scenarios:

 

- Entire repository: 30 000 vendors + 3 000 creations

- Creations: 3 000/4 000 creations in average over the past 5 years

 

To give you more visibility and considering that some of these vendors might be inactive, I added pricing for lower/upper ranges on these 2 perimeters.

 

Let me know if that's clear for you.

 

Regards.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

Dear all,

 

Thanks again for your interest and for the transparency of our discussion.

 

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

 

Have a nice day and week-end.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

	
+33 6 52 22 87 26

Dear all,

 

Thanks again for your interest and for the transparency of our discussion.

 

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

 

Have a nice day and week-end.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

Dear all,

 

Thanks again for your interest and for the transparency of our discussion.

 

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

 

Have a nice day and week-end.

Dear all,

 

I hope you're doing well.

 

We wanted to share with you some recent information concerning Sis ID's value proposition: after 7 years of collaboration with insurer SMA, Sis ID has now entered into a new partnership with Allianz Trade (formerly Euler Hermes), a leading international player. This strategic alliance enables us to enhance our offering by including a tailor made insurance coverage, directly integrated with the Sis ID subscription, to be reimbursed in the event of fraudulent payment (see attachment for more details).

 

At your disposal for further info, have a good day.

 

Regards.

Objet : RE: Chalhoub/BNPP/Sis ID -- bank details control

 

Hi all,

 

You're right Waqas, it means the number of vendors that will be controlled through Sis ID annually. Considering these volumes, I worked on 2 scenarios:

 

- Entire repository: 30 000 vendors + 3 000 creations

- Creations: 3 000/4 000 creations in average over the past 5 years

 

To give you more visibility and considering that some of these vendors might be inactive, I added pricing for lower/upper ranges on these 2 perimeters.

 

Let me know if that's clear for you.

 

Regards.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

Dear all,

 

Thanks again for your interest and for the transparency of our discussion.

 

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

 

Have a nice day and week-end.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

	
+33 6 52 22 87 26

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

Dear all,

 

Thanks again for your interest and for the transparency of our discussion.

 

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

 

Have a nice day and week-end.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

	
+33 6 52 22 87 26

Dear all,

 

I hope you're doing well.

 

We wanted to share with you some recent information concerning Sis ID's value proposition: after 7 years of collaboration with insurer SMA, Sis ID has now entered into a new partnership with Allianz Trade (formerly Euler Hermes), a leading international player. This strategic alliance enables us to enhance our offering by including a tailor made insurance coverage, directly integrated with the Sis ID subscription, to be reimbursed in the event of fraudulent payment (see attachment for more details).

 

At your disposal for further info, have a good day.

 

Regards.

Objet : RE: Chalhoub/BNPP/Sis ID -- bank details control

 

Hi all,

 

You're right Waqas, it means the number of vendors that will be controlled through Sis ID annually. Considering these volumes, I worked on 2 scenarios:

 

- Entire repository: 30 000 vendors + 3 000 creations

- Creations: 3 000/4 000 creations in average over the past 5 years

 

To give you more visibility and considering that some of these vendors might be inactive, I added pricing for lower/upper ranges on these 2 perimeters.

 

Let me know if that's clear for you.

 

Regards.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

Dear all,

 

Thanks again for your interest and for the transparency of our discussion.

 

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

 

Have a nice day and week-end.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

	
+33 6 52 22 87 26

Dear all,

 

Thanks again for your interest and for the transparency of our discussion.

 

You'll find attached the presentation and our NDA (we can use yours if that's easier with your Legal team). Next steps we talked about are described below: 

 

Insurance

 

We're currently updating our insurance documents (expanding coverage), I'll get back to you asap with the latest versions.

 

Price estimate

 

In order to give you a pricing projection on your scope of controls, the necessary information to share is:

 

- volume of your vendors (company ID/bank ID pairs)

- location of your vendors

- volume of creations/modifications of vendors' data per year

 

I'm at your disposal for further information and to align on next steps.

 

Have a nice day and week-end.

 

	


			Martin Grazzini

			Business Developer

	
+33 6 52 22 87 26
